seo.title: Level up your savings
seo.description: 6 years on crypto market to bring you the first-ever NFT interest accounts

main.title: 6 years on crypto market to bring you the first-ever NFT interest accounts
main.alt_pic: Now you can open an interest account in DAI, USDC, USDT and of course CHO for a period of 12-month or more and get up to 25% APR

array.title: connect wallet
array.description: Connect MetaMask wallet. Make sure you are connected to the Binance Smart Chain

array.title: select a coin
array.description: Once your wallet is connected, select a coin, term and specify the amount of the deposit. Check your profitability

array.title: mint
array.description: Click on the Mint button. You will be redirected to confirm this transaction using MetaMask. We will write off the interest account amount, and you will receive your exclusive NFT

array.title: make a profit
array.description: At the end of the interest account period, you will receive your interest account amount and interest specified in the NFT characteristics

works.title: how it works
works.sub_description: All you need is to mint a token to receive a unique NFT with the interest account characteristics to your MetaMask wallet. At the end of the term we will exchange your NFT for the amount of your interest account plus interest

banner.title: Hurry up! The total amount of NFTs is limited
banner.description: It is important that we do not limit the number of NFT interest accounts issued to one MetaMask wallet! But the total amount of NFTs is still limited

security.title: state-of-the-art security
security.description: We are a licensed, fully regulated financial institution in the European Union. Your account is protected by a 3-layer security and an anti-fraud protocol.mited

calculator.title: calculate your profit and mint
calculator.description: Calculate your profit by choosing a coin, desirable term and the interest account amount, check the characteristics, read the terms, mint your NFT and start earning
calculator.label: Choose currency
calculator.lock_description: You will get your interest at the end of the lock period

total.error: We are very sorry that you changed your mind. Come back soon, the total amount of NFTs is limited
total.label: You will earn
total.no_funds: Not enough funds on your wallet. Top up your account or connect another wallet.

verify_modal.title: Verify you transaction
array: You need to confirm the transaction. We kindly ask you to make sure that you have chosen the right blockchain network. If you make a mistake, it's okay, just reject MetaMask transaction.
After confirmation minting will starts automatically.

loading_modal.content: We check the availability of the amount necessary for depositing on the balance of your wallet. The approximate waiting time depends on the blockchain load and can be up to 1 minute.
loading_modal.label: We kindly ask you to make sure that you have chosen the right blockchain network. If you make a mistake, it's okay, just reject the next transaction.
loading_modal.text: While the interest account amount is debited from your wallet we open an interest account for you and generate an NFT.
loading_modal.sub_text: The approximate waiting time depends on the blockchain load and can be up to 1 minute.
loading_modal.description: Current NFTs will be displayed in your Profile

success_mint.title: You have successfully minted
success_mint.profile_link: You can check your NFT at

array.title: How to install MetaMask and BNB Chain?
array.description: For instructions on how to install MetaMask and BNB Chain, watch this YouTube video

array.title: How to mint NFTs?
array.description:
1. Click on “Connect MetaMask” and complete your MetaMask login action.
  2. Now that your MetaMask is connected, make sure you are on the Binance Smart Chain. Here is the link to the instructions on how to install MetaMask and choose the Binance Smart Chain.
  3. Next, select a coin, specify the amount of NFTs you wish to mint and click on “Mint”.
  4. Confirm the transaction on MetaMask.
  5. Done! Go back to your profile page to see the minted NFTs!

array.title: Why does my mint transaction fail?
array.description: If your minting transaction fails, the most likely reason is that you have too little gas fees on your MetaMask. Do not worry! Once you click on "Mint" and you are redirected to MetaMask, click on “Edit” where the estimated gas fee is and simply increase the Gas Price (GWEI) by 1 value (for example, from 5 GWEI to 6 GWEI). This will increase your gas fees, but only by a small amount (a couple of cents).

array.title: How do I see my NFTs after minting?
array.description: Connect your MetaMask wallet and visit your profile page.

array.title: How to add an NFT to your MetaMask wallet?
array.description: Open your MetaMask wallet, then choose NFTs tab a click “Import NFTs” link. After that enter the contract address (USDT - 0x5ed2facc7885aebeb267f91fa243a55aff3c0e47 / USDC - 0xe22E36Db11a52068b4244c58d203a38C561e4988 / DAI - 0x1B1151560b10E1a9718E1bF6dF74E74131Ba7afE) and ID of the minted NFT. After confirmation, it will be displayed in your wallet.

array.title: When do I claim my profit?
array.description: At the end of the interest account period, click on the minted NFTs and then on “Claim”. The token will be burned. You will receive your interest account amount and your interest specified in the NFT characteristics.

array.title: How can I contact support?
array.description: If you have any questions, contact Choise.com Support support@choise.com. We will reply at the earliest.
